metadata.name: Darkness 2 - 6
metadata.description:
Darkness 2 is part of a body of work examining ephemeral experiences of virtual space and the construction of digital memory. The series is captured from a virtual world (https://newart.city/show/darkness-2) of the same name. This the sixth render in a series of seven which are installed in Sensible Galleries (https://newart.city/show/sensible-galleries). Whoever collects this piece will be credited in the virtual exhibition and visible in the metadata to any exhibition visitor.

Each render is a performance documenting phenomena I encountered inside this world. My embodiment in this virtual space is the camera and I am present on the either side of it. It renders a narrow slice of the world around it just as our physical perception does in time. The recording forms a portal between two moments â€“ the first static, the second ever shifting. 

Every visitor's experience will differ depending on the path they take through the space. In 1-5, I am stationary, watching the scene from a specific location. In 6 and 7, I walk a path back and forth across the world. Unless it is recorded, it will never be seen again.

If you take a recording of your own and send it to me, I will install it in Sensible Galleries.
